fields.goal_description: Your well-being matters. Set a goal related to physical activity, nutrition, mental health, or sleep.
fields.task_description: Easy: Walk for 10 minutes, Medium: Prepare a healthy meal from scratch, Hard: Go to fitness class

fields.goal_description: Learning never stops. Whether it's pursuing a degree, learning a new skill, or reading more books, outline your educational aspirations here.
fields.task_description: Easy: Watch a documentary on a topic of interest, Medium: Read a book on a new subject, Hard: Apply for class at local community college

fields.goal_description: What do you love doing in your free time? Set a goal to explore new hobbies or dedicate time to current ones.
fields.task_description: Easy: Dedicate an hour to your hobby, Medium: Complete a small project or artwork, Hard: Learn a new skill related to your hobby

fields.goal_description: Financial health is key. Plan your savings, budgeting, investing, or debt reduction goals.
fields.task_description: Easy: Set up a savings goal for something specific,Medium: Review your last month's expenses, Hard: Plan a no-spend day

fields.goal_description: Personal connections enrich our lives. Set a goal to strengthen relationships with family, friends, or partners.
fields.task_description: Easy: Reach out to an old friend or family member, Medium: Write a letter to someone special, Hard: Plan a quality time activity with a loved one

fields.goal_description: Giving back is rewarding. Consider a goal related to volunteering, community service, or social engagement.
fields.task_description: Easy: Donate items you to a local charity,Medium: Attend a community meeting or event, Hard: Volunteer for a community project or initiative

fields.goal_description: Ambitions drive us forward. Define a professional development goal, job aspiration, or business idea.
fields.task_description: Easy: Update your Linked-In profile or resume,Medium: Set a career goal for the next 6 months, Hard: Ask for feedback from colleagues or a supervisor

fields.goal_description: A tidy space reflects a tidy mind. Set a goal for home organization, cleaning schedules, or personal upkeep.
fields.task_description: Easy: Declutter a specific area, like a desk or drawer, Medium: Do a deep cleaning of one room in your home,Hard: Organize or declutter a challenging area, such as a garage or attic

fields.goal_description: Didn't find a category that resonates with your aspirations? No problem â€” this is your space to introduce a goal that truly reflects your vision. Simply add your unique goal below.
